PHRASE.LANG: Modification de son proche cousin le fusil au bras, le SR-47 .86 le taux du MOD de feu a été augmenté à 686 RPM. A 33 +1 tours dans la chambre, le SR-47 .86 MOD prend en charge trois modes de tir: semi, 3 rafale ronde et pleine automobiles. [#Legal]

Modified from its close cousin rifle at arms, the SR-47 .86 MOD's rate of fire has been increased to 686 RPM. At 33+1 rounds in the chamber, the SR-47 .86 MOD supports three fire modes: Semi, 3 round burst, and full auto. [#Legal]
